data.text: @AllenJWilson @MikeKBerg @BreitbartNews @MayorBowser Odd; billions in covid relief funds to right wingers is actively being recuperated, because Trump fired the IG charged with distributing and overseeing those funds. #CrookedTrump. Crooks and liars amuse me.
@MikeKBerg @BreitbartNews And our Vets are sleeping on the streets..
@tmbhmltn @MikeKBerg @jtLOL @BreitbartNews Streetscapes and beautification, Tim. We ain’t talking about building roads in BLM Plaza.
@MikeKBerg @BreitbartNews Hey, anything that helps black people be more prosperous is good with me.  Did renaming a plaza do the trick?

@MikeKBerg @BreitbartNews that's all??

Too many suckers have too much more money to give away!
@MikeKBerg @BreitbartNews Same BLM that California warned people not to donate to due to suspected fraud?
@MikeKBerg @lbc360 @BreitbartNews They also seem to really love their streetscapes. That's always helpful when facing such a scary pandemic that has a 98% survival rate.

@AllenJWilson @MikeKBerg @BreitbartNews @MayorBowser It looks like the majority of the funds were used for brick & mortar.  Of course, people like these Dem mayors spend first and don’t worry about asking questions later.  Arrogance and corruption.
